attributes.action: listen to the taxpayers of this country and DO NOT spend any of our money on the reconstruction of Zimbabwe without first recovering EVERY SINGLE ONE of the dollars salted away by Robert Mugabe and his cronies during their destruction of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayers of this country deserve to have at least SOME of their taxes spent on improving their lot.  MR BROWN MUST STOP GIVING OUR MONEY AWAY TO ANY AND EVERY CAUSE ON THE PLANET.  WE CANNOT AFFORD IT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
